turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. This is getting ridiculous, I've been trying to call for days!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can help with that. To schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, could you please provide your full name, date of birth, and insurance information?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my name is John Smith, my date of birth is 01/15/1988, and my insurance is Blue Cross Blue Shield, member ID is 1234567890.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, John. I see you in the system. Dr. Ramirez has availability on Tuesday, October 24th at 10:00 AM, or Thursday, October 26th at 2:00 PM. Which would you prefer? Also, can you remind me what is the purpose of the visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: October 26th at 2:00 PM works. I need to discuss some concerning blood test results from my last physical. Honestly, I'm a little worried. How long are appointments typically scheduled for? I don't want to feel rushed.
